check-door.description: Verify if a door is closed, alert if open. Uses camera to detect door state via vision analysis.
check-door.author: evil_sky

count-people-in-room.description: Count people in room by rotating and scanning with camera. Performs 360-degree scan, runs YOLO person detection, and deduplicates across angles.
count-people-in-room.author: evil_sky

count-door.description: Count the number of doors in the room by scanning with camera and moving around.
count-door.author: evil_sky
